The Ferry Boats to be screened at Bite Your Tongue

Dec 9, 2008

A surge of student organizing this semester at the New School includes two fledgling community media projects spreading their wings.  This Thursday night, the New School radio station WSNR and web publishing portal The New Campus will host Bite Your Tongue, a night of media, art, and socializing in the Teresa Lang Center at 55 W 13th st.  The stop motion adventure The Ferry Boats, which I produced with Joshua Blank, will be screened in addition to other top-notch, hand-picked pieces.  Come see!
